text: Salil Prabhakar from Delta ID Inc., Newark, CA was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for contributions to biometrics technology. He was named a Fellow of the Society of Photographic Instrumentation Engineers (SPIE) in 2014 and a Fellow of the International Association for Pattern Recognition (IAPR) in 2012. Prabhakar cofounded Delta ID Inc in the San Francisco Bay Area in 2011.https://venturebeat.com/author/dr-salil-prabhakar-delta-id-inc/ Prior to that he was part of the initial core Aadhar team as a bio-metric expert.https://blogs.wsj.com/indiarealtime/2010/09/29/whos-who-in-nilekanis- uid-dream-team/ Salil Prabhakar completed his Ph.D. from Michigan State University in 2001. He graduated in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) from Indian Institute of Technology (BHU) Varanasi in 1996.https://www.bloomberg.com/research/stocks/private/person.asp?personId=20875724&privcapId;=246221310http://www.itbhuglobal.org/chronicle/archives/2017/03/dr_salil_prabha.php == References == Category:Banaras Hindu University alumni Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Salil Prabhakar
